snippet: Shares largely traded in a range throughout the session. Krispy Kreme Doughnuts rose 24 percent after the company agreed to be taken private.
abstract: Stocks are mostly flat as gains by drug company shares are offset by drops in metals and energy stocks.
lead_paragraph: Shares largely traded in a range throughout the session. Krispy Kreme Doughnuts rose 24 percent after the company agreed to be taken private.

headline.main: Metals and Energy Stocks Lose, as Drug Makers Gain
headline.print_headline: Metals and Energy Lose, as Drug Makers Gain
